rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C130272

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered Test Name Terminology

definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self test name.
name: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered Test Name Terminology
synonyms: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Taking care of your household responsibilities?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Care of Household Responsibilities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Concentrating for Ten Minutes

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
terms.submissionValue: WD7-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
synonyms: WD7-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Dealing with people you do not know?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Dealing With People You Do Not Know
terms.submissionValue: WD7-Dealing With People You Do Not Know
synonyms: WD7-Dealing With People You Do Not Know

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Doing most important household tasks well?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Doing Important Household Tasks

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Doing your most important work/school tasks well?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Doing Important Work or School Tasks

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much has your health been a drain on the financial resources of you or your family?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Drain on Financial Resources

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Eating?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Eating

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much have you been emotionally affected by your health condition?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Emotionally Affected by Health

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Analysing and finding solutions to problems in day-to-day life?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Finding Solutions to Problems

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting along with people who are close to you?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Get Along With People Close to You
terms.submissionValue: WD7-Get Along With People Close to You
synonyms: WD7-Get Along With People Close to You

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting all the work done that you need to do?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting All Work Done You Need
terms.submissionValue: WD7-Getting All Work Done You Need
synonyms: WD7-Getting All Work Done You Need

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting dressed?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Dressed

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting all the household work done that you needed to do?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Household Work Done Needed

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting your household work done as quickly as needed?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Household Work Done Quickly

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting out of your home?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Out of Your Home

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting your work done as quickly as needed?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed
terms.submissionValue: WD7-Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed
synonyms: WD7-Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - How Many Days Difficulties Present

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - How Many Days Reduce Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Learning a New Task

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Maintaining a friendship?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Maintaining a Friendship

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Making new friends?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Making New Friends

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Moving around inside your home?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Moving Around Inside Your Home

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have because of barriers or hindrances in the world around you?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Because of Barriers in World
terms.submissionValue: WD7-Problem Because of Barriers in World
synonyms: WD7-Problem Because of Barriers in World

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your family have because of your health problems?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Did Your Family Have

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have in doing things by yourself for relaxation or pleasure?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Doing Things for Relaxation

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have in joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Joining Community Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have living with dignity because of the attitudes and actions of others?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Living with Dignity

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Remembering to do important things?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Remembering to Do Important Things

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Sexual activities?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Sexual Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Standing up from sitting down?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Standing Up From Sitting Down

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Standing for Long Periods

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Starting and maintaining a conversation?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Starting or Maintaining Conversation

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Staying by yourself for a few days?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Staying by Yourself for a Few Days
terms.submissionValue: WD7-Staying by Yourself for a Few Days
synonyms: WD7-Staying by Yourself for a Few Days

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much time did you spend on your health condition, or its consequences?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Time Spend on Your Health Condition
terms.submissionValue: WD7-Time Spend on Your Health Condition
synonyms: WD7-Time Spend on Your Health Condition

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Generally understanding what people say?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Understanding What People Say

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Walking a Long Distance

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Washing your whole body?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Washing Your Whole Body

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: your day-to-day work/school?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Your Day-to-Day Work or School
